skills.name: Gravity Plus: Rapid Fire
skills.description: Rapid-fire weapon that deals continuous DMG to targets along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies take more DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less). Wielder has 15.0% bonus max HP in battle. Team deals 15% bonus Total DMG against weakened enemies.

skills.name: Distortion Field
skills.description: [SP: 21][CD: 30s] Generate a field lasting 7s that inflicts upon enemies 50.0% Move Slow, 150% ATK of Physical DMG per second, and slowly drags them towards the center of the field. If not weakened, the enemy also suffers Weaken (ATK is reduced by 10%) for 3s.
